allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Racing telemetry validation pipeline

Production-ready GPU-accelerated pipeline for processing multi-GB racing 
telemetry datasets into synchronized, validated simulation-ready data.

Features:
- GPU acceleration with RAPIDS cuDF (auto CPU fallback)
- Time synchronization (99.999% backwards timestamp elimination)
- Deterministic lap boundary detection
- GPS/track position normalization
- Multi-car global time alignment and resampling
- Great Expectations validation suite
- Comprehensive logging and audit trails

Pipeline stages:
1. Ingestion: Chunked CSV reading with anomaly detection
2. Time correction: Drift calibration and step detection
3. Lap repair: Deterministic boundary detection
4. Position normalization: GPS minutes to degrees
5. Pivot: Long format to wide format transformation
6. Resample: Uniform 20Hz time grid per car
7. Synchronization: Multi-car global time alignment
8. Validation: Quality checks at each stage

Tested on Barber Motorsports Park R1 data (11.5M rows, 20 cars).
EOF
)")
